summary: Frontend testing completed for refactored StatisticsDashboard components. BeltProgressCard and GradeCardsGrid work correctly. DeplacementsSection has a data structure mismatch bug.

ui_bugs.issue: Data structure mismatch - component expects taiSabaki, ashiSabaki, japanese, french properties but DEPLACEMENTS_DATA has different structure (name, description, troisPas, etc.)

issues: Minor: jsx attribute warning in console - 'Received true for a non-boolean attribute jsx'

action_items: Fix DeplacementsSection.jsx to match DEPLACEMENTS_DATA structure - change dir.japanese to dir.name, dir.french to dir.description
Add missing taiSabaki and ashiSabaki data to deplacementsData.js OR update DeplacementsSection to use existing data (troisPas, posePied, etc.)
Fix jsx attribute warning in BeltProgressCard (style jsx should be style)
critical_code_review_comments: DeplacementsSection.jsx references DEPLACEMENTS_DATA.taiSabaki and DEPLACEMENTS_DATA.ashiSabaki which don't exist in deplacementsData.js
Direction items in deplacementsData.js have 'name' and 'description' but component expects 'japanese' and 'french'
BeltProgressCard uses styled-jsx syntax which causes React warning
context_for_next_testing_agent: BeltProgressCard and GradeCardsGrid components work correctly. DeplacementsSection has data mismatch bug that prevents full expansion. All 4 accordions toggle correctly. Belt dialog opens when clicking BeltProgressCard.

components_tested.name: BeltProgressCard
features_working: Animal spirit emoji (üê£ Petit Poussin) displays correctly
Belt name and grade display (Ceinture Blanche, 6e kyu)
Progress bar to next belt (Ceinture Jaune)

components_tested.name: GradeCardsGrid
features_working: All 6 grade cards display with correct colors
5e KYU (yellow), 4e KYU (orange), 3e KYU (green), 2e KYU (blue), 1er KYU (brown), SHODAN (black)
Progress bars and technique counts display
Rank labels (D√©butant, Apprenti, Avanc√©, Expert, Pr√©-Dan, 1er Dan)

components_tested.name: DeplacementsSection
features_broken: Direction labels show undefined (japanese/french properties missing)
Ninja tip may not display due to errors

components_tested.name: Belt Dialog
features_working: Shows all 7 belt options with points
Displays symbolic roles for each belt
